channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Sarasota must put limits on downtown parties, special eventsDavid Lough Guest columnist
item.description: The city of Sarasota is developing a new special event ordinance – a local law that regulates public events such as festivals, celebrations and block parties held on city streets, sidewalks and other public areas (including parks).

item.title: Roth shock: How a hasty conversion can cost Florida retirees thousands
item.description: Imagine you’re retired in Florida, relying on Social Security and a modest nest egg. You read about Roth conversions – moving taxable IRA funds into a tax-free Roth – and think, “Smart idea.” But that move could end up costing you more in taxes and Medicare premiums than you’d expect. Those so-called “senior benefits” from the IRS barely make a dent.

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk. Here's why I decided to sell the house
item.description: I should know by now, if you venture into an exploratory hypothetical conversation with a real estate broker, you might as well start packing. One casual conversation with a broker friend started the house hurricane.

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk, part 2: How I stopped hyperventilating
item.description: Now that my husband, DC, and I had sold the Happier Yellow House to the first buyer who saw it, we were quite suddenly, technically, homeless. Yeep! My head was literally spinning. I need to sit down often and put my head between my knees.

item.title: When do Starbucks, Dunkin’ Donuts fall menus come out? Rumored dates
item.description: While it might be another few months until we actually feel the fall weather, it's less than a week until we starttastingit.

item.title: 2025 Class 6A-11 Football Previews: Lakewood Ranch, Palmetto, Parrish Community
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune will get you ready for the 2025 high school football season. Here are previews for the teams competing in FHSAA District 6A-11.
